BiathlonSymulation

Class Run

  • java.lang.Object
    • desmoj.core.simulator.NamedObject
      • desmoj.core.simulator.ModelComponent
        • desmoj.core.simulator.Reportable
          • desmoj.core.simulator.Model
            • BiathlonSymulation.Run

  • public class Run
extends desmoj.core.simulator.Model
    This is the model class. It is the main class of a simple process-oriented model of the biathlon mass start run.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Run

        public Run(desmoj.core.simulator.Model owner,
   java.lang.String modelName,
   boolean showInReport,
   boolean showInTrace)
        Run constructor. Creates a new Run model via calling the constructor of the superclass.
        Parameters:
        owner - the model this model is part of (set to null when there is no such model)
        modelName - this model's name
        showInReport - flag to indicate if this model shall produce output to the report file
        showInTrace - flag to indicate if this model shall produce output to the trace file

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
        Runs the model.
        Parameters:
        args - is an array of command-line arguments (will be ignored here)

      • QueueRunner

        public void QueueRunner(Runner runner)
        Queue runner to next stage.
        Parameters:
        runner - - current, which has to be queued.

      • description

        public java.lang.String description()
        returns a description of the model to be used in the report.
        Specified by:
        description in class desmoj.core.simulator.Model
        Returns:
        model description as a string

      • doInitialSchedules

        public void doInitialSchedules()
        activates dynamic model components (simulation processes). This method is used to place all events or processes on the internal event list of the simulator which are necessary to start the simulation. In this case, the truck generator and the van carrier(s) have to be created and activated.
        Specified by:
        doInitialSchedules in class desmoj.core.simulator.Model

      • init

        public void init()
        initialises static model components like distributions and queues.
        Specified by:
        init in class desmoj.core.simulator.Model
